item.title: Death Metal playlist for 12/2015
item.description: Including: Abominable Putridity, Brutality, Cannibal Corpse, Devourment, Disentomb, Fleshgod Apocalypse, Gorerotted, Morbid Angel, Nihilist (Pre-Entombed), Rivers Of Nihil.
